instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 picture bad in display (internal and external)
threads.message:
Hi,
i have this board clean, make that on external and internal display.
How can make that?
[URL='https://www.dropbox.com/s/tek3ci6299ne127/IMG_1392.jpeg?dl=0']Image[/URL]
thanks
Best regards

threads.title: 820-3115 picture bad in display (internal and external)
threads.message:
Try different RAM modules, one socket at time.
If still the same, then CPU problem; iGPU failure...

threads.title: 820-3115 picture bad in display (internal and external)
threads.message: I try different memory, I forgot to tell you.
